EmailTemplate.description: Email template to show new QBO customers how to link their accountant
EmailTemplate.name: QBO Accountant Connect
EmailTemplate.subject: Connect your accountant to QuickBooks Online
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit QuickBooks Online
Connect your accountant to your QuickBooks Online file.
Real-time support
Your accountant can see your data in real-time to answer questions and solve problems with a quick call.
Save Time No more copies of your books transferred back and forth, work from a single up-to-date database.
Save Money Don’t pay your accountant to drive to your business, they can access your data real-time… anytime.
Follow these 3 simple steps to enable your accountant to collaborate with you in QuickBooks Online
-Under Your Company settings select Manage Users.
-Click Invite Accountant
-Fill out your accountant’s information and they will be sent an email.
That’s it – you’re done!
Once accepted by your accountant, they will now have the ability to collaborate with your QuickBooks Online file.
Login to QuickBooks Online now to add your accountant
Need help? Call customer support at 1-855-253-1536 (press option 1, then option 3) and speak with a support representative.
Intuit, Inc., Customer Communications 2800 E. Commerce Center Place, Tucson, AZ 85706.
IMPORTANT NOTICE: Intuit respects the personal nature of email and this email is being sent at your verbal request. A previously stated opt out does not apply to this email. If you would like to update your contact preferences, you may do so at https://privacy.intuit.com/cpi/do/preferences?p_isForeign=0&z=&dialog=0&p_sourceid=5&p_closeoncancel=0&hidenav=0&p_prioritycode.
